A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Perhaps the most beloved protagonist in cinematic history\, Luke Skywalker\, has his storied and revered character utterly emasculated and sequentially killed off.  Fans of the original trilogy are left scratching their heads\, and possibly quite angry\, as to why such an unnecessary decision was made.  Disney will likely loose money in the long haul over this bizarre directorial choice.
